mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS num FROM spring_bbs
mapper.insert: insert into spring_bbs values (spring_bbs_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, spring_bbs_seq.currval, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT num, name, title, content, write_date, to_char(write_date, 'hh24:mi:ss') as write_time, ref, step, lev, write_cnt FROM spring_bbs WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE spring_bbs SET write_cnt = write_cnt + 1 WHERE num = #{num}
